definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
head/hair style/the top/end/beginning or end/a stub/remnant/chief/boss/side/aspect/first/leading/classifier for pigs or livestock/CL:個|个[ge4]
erhua variant of 煙頭|烟头[yan1 tou2]

sentences.english: Don't fling the cigarette butt out of the window.
sentences.chinese: 别把香烟头扔到窗外去。

sentences.english: As soon as he saw me, he took one hard draw on the cigarette and flicked it away.
sentences.chinese: 他看到我，就猛吸了最后一口烟，甩掉烟头。

sentences.english: Smoke lingers in the air hours after cigarettes are put out.
sentences.chinese: 烟头熄灭后烟雾还会在空气中停留数小时。

sentences.english: Stub out that cigarette and make it your last.
sentences.chinese: 掐灭烟头，让它成为你的最后一根烟。

sentences.english: There's cigarette burn on the bed sheet.
sentences.chinese: 床单上有一个香烟头的烧痕。

sentences.english: Some people self-injure by burning their skin with the end of a cigarette or lighted match.
sentences.chinese: 也有人通过烟头或点着的火柴烫伤自己。

sentences.english: Forest fires are often caused by broken glass or by cigarette ends which people carelessly throw away.
sentences.chinese: 森林火灾时常由破玻璃或人们随手扔掉的香烟头引起。

sentences.english: The cord carpet on the floor was covered in cigarette burns.
sentences.chinese: 地板上细绳编织的地毯到处可见烟头烧过的痕迹。

sentences.english: Next time you're out cruising, watch an 11-year-old with a butt in his mouth.
sentences.chinese: 下次去逛街，看看一个11岁的孩子嘴里叼个烟头。

sentences.english: Then he threw the butt down into the dirty water and made his way back the way he had come.
sentences.chinese: 然后他把烟头扔下肮脏的水，向他来时的路走去。

sentences.english: When smoking , should go to safety zone, when cigarette end does not be put out , must not take man-days to make place.
sentences.chinese: 吸烟时应到安全地带，烟头未熄时不得带人工作场所。

sentences.english: From where I sit, all the universe is equidistant from my cigarette.
sentences.chinese: 以我坐的地方为准，宇宙万物跟我的烟头距离相等。

sentences.english: Maybe somebody forget to put out the dog-end.
sentences.chinese: 也许是某人忘记把烟头熄灭了。

sentences.english: The cause of the fire was a cigarette end.
sentences.chinese: 火灾的起因是一个香烟头。

sentences.english: This ashtray seems deep enough to hold all the cigarette ends in the world.
sentences.chinese: 这个烟灰缸深得似乎盛的下世界上所有的烟头。

sentences.english: Diego flung his cigarette into the dark.
sentences.chinese: 迭戈把烟头抛入沉沉的夜色。

definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
see 打火機|打火机[da3 huo3 ji1]
